tha-ap365:0.3_0: ascended with the most senior, his broken goblins,
tha-ap365:1.1_0: “The Buddha, the name of the Buddha,
tha-ap365:1.2_0: who has gone beyond all things.
tha-ap365:1.3_0: The virtuous and the teacher of seclusion,
tha-ap365:2.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
tha-ap365:2.2_0: the conqueror of all the earths,
tha-ap365:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap365:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap365:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āḷavāḷavikā.
tha-ap365:6.1_0: The third part of the senior monks with mosquitoes, wind, and sun.
